description:
1. Nova boot a powervm instance with flavor 1

2. After it is ACTIVE, ssh to IVM and log on it successfully.

3. Nova resize the instance and wait till it turn to VERIFY_RESIZE and confirm it. VM status turn to ACTIVE.

4. Try to log on A, but failed.
title: Can't log into  VM after powervm is resized

commit 5643bd5d9bf17335e109d4b2d93e161f4d12c6f9
Author: guohliu <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Apr 17 18:22:57 2013 +0800

    Fix powervm driver resize instance error
    
    During a resize operation in powervm, the logical volume
    of the instance will be copied and compressed to a file.
    Current logic decompresses it twice before copying this file
    to a new volume which will cause the new instance to not
    boot properly.
    
    Fixes bug #1169848
    
    Change-Id: I91f536919511aafbf7dbe14abbee48dbceb189b2
